backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with user profiles, payment method support, attachment storage, and access‑controlled APIs for managing profiles and uploads.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old user profiles to the new format by adding a nullable preferred payment method field.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping payment‑method‑related features to impacted frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their responsibilities and structure.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React app with a root div and module script entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application router and theme provider, declaring all site routes and linking them to components.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access‑denied message with a login button for unauthorized admin access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AuthRequiredScre: Shows a login prompt for users attempting to access authenticated pages without being signed in.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldError: Displays a small error message with an icon for form fields.
frontend/src/components/forms/StarRating: Provides an interactive optional 1–5 star rating input with keyboard and hover support.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Implements an Internet Identity login/logout button with automatic query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the footer with brand info, navigation links, and contact details using businessInfo data.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders the site header with navigation, authentication-aware links, contact info, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout including header, footer, outlet content, and a profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Exports static business contact and service information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Checks authentication and determines whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttachments.ts: Manages fetching and uploading user attachments via the backend, including progress support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile and provides a helper to extract display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Handles fetching and submitting booking data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRateCard.ts: Fetches and updates the rate card data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferral.ts: Provides React Query hooks to generate, fetch, apply referral codes and retrieve referral bonuses via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark mode color themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero section, company story, values, and mission information.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin page that loads bookings, user profile, and rate card data, enforces admin access, and provides UI to view bookings and update rate card pricing.
frontend/src/pages/BookCabPage.tsx: Implements a detailed cab booking form with validation, user profile prefill, and booking submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information cards including phone, email, helpline, service area, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows an FAQ section using an accordion with common questions and answers about services.
frontend/src/pages/FleetPage.tsx: Renders a fleet overview page showing various vehicle types with features, capacity, and descriptions in a grid of cards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero banner, feature highlights, navigation buttons, and promotional imagery.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays pricing info including factors, example fare ranges, inclusions, and exclusions using cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides a user profile management page with fields for name, payment method, referrals, and document uploads, using multiple hooks for backend data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of service offerings such as airport transfers, outstation trips, and corporate services, each with descriptions and feature lists.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials page with a hero section, grid of customer reviews, and CTA section using static testimonial data.
frontend/src/utils/paymentMethods.ts: Defines payment method options and a helper to retrieve display labels for payment methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, new feature requests, issues, and architectural notes for the Aasra Cab Portal.
